name: get_the_market_calendar
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tradier.
Tool description: Tradier is a brokerage platform for equity and options trading. It is designed to provide simple, intuitive, and inexpensive ways for users to place trades, check their balances, and transfer money. Tradier provides a RESTful API for accessing the platform's trading functions, account services, and real-time and historical market data.
API description: Fetches the market calendar for a given month and year using the Tradier API.

month.description: The month for which to retrieve the market calendar. Defaults to '11'.

year.description: The year for which to retrieve the market calendar. Defaults to '2013'.
